snippet.title: 4x4 PROGRESS GamePlay Trailer
snippet.description:
4X4 PROGRESS is on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3376550/4X4_PROGRESS/

God doesn't play dice games.
Because he likes slot machines.

The player becomes the god of one of 16 different civilizations and guides them from the Stone Age to the modern era.
In a small 4X4 panel, you place various tiles such as cities, farmlands, and mines, and depending on the layout, you have to get resources and induce technological development to advance your civilization.
Of course, each civilization has its own unique tiles, so you can enjoy different gameplay for each civilization.

Defend your civilization from the attacks of enemies that invade at regular intervals,
and can your civilization launch a rocket into space?
